meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Common</kanji> <kanji>peoples</kanji> make up the <vocabulary>masses</vocabulary>. They are the <vocabulary>common people</vocabulary> and no society is complete without them.

Depending on the context, 庶民 can take on a slightly negative connotation, especially if the 庶民 in question are contrasted with more elite or sophisticated groups.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
